backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports describing UI changes for the Sanskruti Novelty card and associated updated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up PWA meta tags, loading main.tsx, and registering the service worker.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, colors, icons, and standalone display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first offline support with pre-cached assets and cache version v2.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling tab switching and rendering layout, tabs, PWA banner, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/BottomTabBar.tsx: Renders the fixed bottom tab navigation with icons, Hindi labels, and active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a fixed footer with an Instagram link attribution to @the_desi.musafir.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing header, gradient background, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Shows an install prompt banner for PWA installation with iOS and Android-specific instructions.
frontend/src/components/recommendation/B: Badge component rendering a styled camera badge positioned at the top-right of recommendation cards.
frontend/src/components/recommendation/C: Generic recommendation card component supporting optional images and displaying title, subtitle, and description.
frontend/src/config/monetization.ts: Exports WhatsApp contact number and a helper to generate WhatsApp message URLs.
frontend/src/data/dwarkaGuide.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for itinerary structures and exports detailed multi-day Dwarka travel itineraries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Implements logic to detect PWA installability, handle beforeinstallprompt events, and show or dismiss installation prompts.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes, including custom Dwarka color presets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root component.
frontend/src/tabs/ConnectivityTab.tsx: Renders connectivity information and a monetized car/bike rental CTA plus transport tables for Dwarka travel.
frontend/src/tabs/RulesTimingsTab.tsx: Displays temple rules, prohibited items, timings, and general guidelines using styled UI components.
frontend/src/tabs/StayFoodTab.tsx: Renders categorized stay and food options using cards and lists sourced from stayFoodData.
frontend/src/tabs/YatraPlanTab.tsx: Displays selectable multi-day itineraries with timeline cards, map links, and day-by-day details.
frontend/src/utils/googleMaps.ts: Provides a helper that generates a Google Maps search URL for a given place in Dwarka.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, plugins, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the PWAâ€™s current state, architectural constraints, feature requirements, and known issues.
